topics.body:
So I just woke up from a dream where I met the most adorable human being in the word, getting rejected by him, being okay with that and years later meeting him again, finding out he's getting married and being _super_ not okay with that

It was kind of an emotional roller coaster

topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a5608b6368723912002940#post_55a5608b6368723912002940
or maybe it's the fact that you're okay with things fucking up now but later they escalate into actual issues

it might be a good idea to get your ass in gear, cuz let me tell you life's a fucking drag when you're trying to fix problem after problem while you're being surrounded by more issues and then taking to more issues to make the current ones seem like less of one and you know that those problems will exist after you fix these current problems while youre being fuelled by a feigned sense of hope that things will get better

but that advice could be written off because who wants to deal with shit when they could chill, right? cuz shit, that's what im doing

topics.body:
"@hype":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a569446368726f43000bc1#post_55a569446368726f43000bc1
How to not be board, Zak's ultimate guido:

Step 1: Find the nearest chopping board
Step 2: KILL EVERYONE
Step 4: Ignore step 2
Step 6: Realize there was no step 5
Step 7: Wait hold on we forgot 4 aswell
Step 9: oh gosh i meant to say 3 not 4
Step 10: FUCK
Step 11: ?????
Step 12: How do i do this without knowing what step 11 is?
step 13: THE END IS NEVER THE END IS NEVER THE END IS NEVER THE END IS NEVER THE END IS NEVER etc.
Step 14: At this point you really are wondering when this will stop.
Step 15: heeeeeeeeeeey
Step 16: hoooooooooooo
Step 17: No ok i'm stoping now
Step 18: haha lol i'm so random
Step 19: omg 18 didn't you hear 17?
Step 20: Well here we are again...
